#labels Featured
#Config

= Config file =
Support for customised MetaGETA settings/preferences is being implemented. As of version 1.3.2 setting values for the default metadata contact (e.g. custodian/publisher/etc.) will be supported.

As of v. 1.3.4, some Geonetwork parameters can be set which are used when generating [http://geonetwork-opensource.org/manuals/trunk/developer/mef/index.html MEFs].

The [http://code.google.com/p/metageta/source/browse/trunk/config/config.xml MetaGETA config file] can be found at: {install directory}/metageta/config
